Package fr.uparis.energy.model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
fr.uparis.energy.model.Board
public class Board extends Object
Represents the board of a level.

      Sets the given row at the given index.
      Parameters:
      lineNumber - index for the given row.
      row - to be set.
      setNeighbors - true if we need to initialize the neighbors.
      Throws:
      InvalidSizeException - if the given row length is not valid.
